#!/usr/bin/env Rscript
#usage- chmod 755 finalRcode.Rmd

install.packages("tidyverse")
install.packages("originr")

library("tidyverse")
library("originr")

x = "Not in GISD"
invasive = list()

filenames = dir(pattern="finalsamplecolumn*") #finds required species files
for( i in 1:length(filenames) ) #creates for-loop for those files
{
  total = (nrow(i)-1)
  for(element in 2:length(i)){
    presence <- gisd(element)
    if(presence == x){
      print("Not in database")
    }
    else{ invasive <- element}
  }
  
  percent_invasive = ((length(invasive))/total)*100  
  print('percent_invasive percent of species in this sample are invasive') 
  
  for(y in invasive){
    print('species is found in native_range()')
  }
}
